text: Charles Marvin Green Jr. (October 16, 1950 better known as Angry Grandpa or simply AGP, was an American internet personality and former firefighter. With his son; Michael, he had a YouTube channel known as "TheAngryGrandpaShow", that had over 4 million subscribers. ==Life and death== He was born on October 16, 1950 in Chatham County, Georgia. He had bipolar disorder and suffered from skin cancer. In October 2017, He was hospitalized for cirrhosis, kidney stones and pneumonia. His health began to get worse when he suffered from high ammonia levels. He died at his home in Summerville, South Carolina on December 10, 2017 of problems caused by cirrhosis.
